Bayleys Hanmer Springs offer a wide range of real estate services. We market a diverse range of properties including residential, lifestyle, apartments, sections and businesses.

item.title: Church Of The Epiphany
item.desc:
For that special day, the Church of the Epiphany in Hanmer Springs is a beautiful space for your wedding. For over 100 years this historic church with its rich wooden interior and beautiful stained windows has made a perfect setting for weddings.
Also spacious grounds lend themselves for those special photos.
For further information contact Rev. Wally Behan

From classical and stylish, streetwear and casual we have beautiful clothing with a touch of difference, to make you look and feel your best.
For the latest ranges of quality New Zealand and International fashion labels our professional and friendly staff are there to assist.
We invite you to come and visit us at FashionWorks.
Clothing, shoes, jewellery, handbags and accessories.

The most amazing range of swimwear you'll find anywhere plus quality lifestyle clothing labels. New Zealand & Australian brands for men and women from teens upwards, something for everyone.
Swimwear, street wear, surf wear, shoes, hats and accessories. Friendly, knowledgeable and professional staff are there to help you find the right style and fit for you.

item.title: Mhor
item.desc:
For many visitors to Hanmer Springs, Mhor (pronounced: more) is their first stop on arrival. With a unique and contemporary look, relaxed feel, friendly staff and extensive collection of 'most wanted' labels, temptation is hard to resist.
Stockists of: * Metalicus * Loobie's Story * Marilyn Styb * Episode * David Pond * Scarlet * Verge * Vago.

item.title: Rohm
item.desc:
The 'younger sister' to Mhor, Rohm (pronounced: rome) is fast establishing its own personality and dedicated followers of fashion.
Rohm carries a range complementary to Mhor, and both shops are specifically for the 30+ woman who loves a variety of contemporary, wearable, desirable and affordable clothing.

item.title: The Koru Tree
item.desc:
We are proud stockists of a unique range of NZ made gifts. These include Kiwiana pottery from Splashy, glassware from Revitaglass plus a great selection of NZ prints. Also our Pacifica range of aromatherapy captures the essence of Aotearoa.
These are just a few of our interesting items we have in store, so pop in when you are in Hanmer.
We are open 7 days.

item.title: Ula - Jewellery Clothing Gifts
item.desc:
Whether you're out to find that one special item, or in to discover something new & amazing, you'll enjoy browsing the racks in this vibrant store with an outstanding choice, and great prices! On offer are gorgeous dresses, tunics, tees & tops, scarves, skirts & pants.
The Menswear range is edgy but understated.
Ula stores are in Hanmer Springs, Kaikoura, Akaroa, Christchurch & Alexandra.
